attributes.action: Inclusion of an abstention box on national and local election ballot papers
attributes.additional_details: Give the electorate the same right to abstain on a national or local election  vote --due to lack of prefered options , a disregard for political partys , policies presented by them or a dislike of an individual(s)--that the members of chambers of governing bodies are themselves entitled to.

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:

Petition Title: Abstaining

Created by: Brian Whicher

Closing: 30/03/15
